title: On Critical Race Theory & the Election with Arron Rabinowitz
description:
I speak with moral Philosopher and host to Embrace the Void podcast Arron Rabinowitz on his thoughts about Critical Race theory and his concerns about the election. I enjoyed hearing his perspective, as I think dialogue with those who hold a different point of view from you own is very important in this time. I learned quite a but and look forward to hearing all of your thoughts

Watch in podcast form here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/On-Critical-Race-Theory--the-Election-with-Arron-Rabinowitz-ev8ij1

Aaron's podcasts:
https://voidpod.com
https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/philosophers-in-space/id1348915993

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
